1.name: Rusted Sword
1.description: An old rusted blade, maybe a formitable weapon at one time, now it may as well just be a blunt bar of iron.

2.name: Rusted Shortword
2.description: Very much like another blade you could have sworn that you saw.. only much worse.

3.name: Wicked Dagger
3.description: A terrifying dagger with a red ruby in the handle, and a serrated edge designed to tear open arteries and let blood rush forth...
